Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

NameDescription
Joala BOMJoala Bill of Materials POM
Joala parentJoala parent: Joala is a set of libraries to assist in writing tests based on JUnit testing framework.
Joala 3rd-party BOMJoala Bill of Materials for Thirdparty artifacts.
Joala conditionsImplements Waiting for JUnit tests. Concept contains expressions which are responsible to retrieve a state of the application, matcher to verify the expected state (from Hamcrest Library) and conditions which are responsible to repeat the evaluation of the given expression until the state matches the expected state.
Joala 3rd-party Test BOMJoala Bill of Materials for Thirdparty test artifacts. Used to have common test libraries throughout all modules. Not deployed on release.
Joala matchersMatchers in addition to those provided by Hamcrest. Might be added as proposal to Hamcrest matchers. Thus take these as experimental.
Joala build-toolsSupport for Build-Tooling. Especially to create checkstyle reports.
